thread.section_title: PickleballCentral Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PickleballCentral | pickleballcentral.com | 2 of 114
thread.title: Nancy

author: Nancy
title: Nancy
text:
It turns out that my husband didn't want a portable pickleball net which I ordered as a Christmas present. He plays pickleball three to five times a week, but always indoors. I looked at the nets on Amazon and other sites and Pickleball Central had the regulation height. I did look at the equipment when it arrived, and it was sturdy. I think the net is the best quality offered online. It was totally understandable that I had to pay shipping to return it, but at least I was not charged a restocking fee. I recommend this company and would buy from them again.
Nancy
